entry.name: START
entry.description: A job starts to process here.

entry.name: DUMMY
entry.description: A dummy entry.

entry.name: OK
entry.description: This comparisson is true when no errors have occured.

entry.name: ERROR
entry.description: This comparisson is true when one or more errors have occured.

entry.name: Telenet Mail
entry.subject: Testmail Chef
entry.comment:
This mail was sent because an error occurred in a Kettle Job (or something other). Please check the job specified below.
Your Kettle admin!

job.name: get README from belnet, current suse mirror

entry.name: Create table [d_abcd]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_abcd]

entry.name: Copy data to [d_abcd]
entry.description: This job entry executes the transformation to copy data from: [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_abcd] to: [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_abcd]
entry.transname: copy [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_abcd] to [MySQL Test @ Localhost]

entry.name: Create table [d_customer]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_customer]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_customer ( customer_tk BIGINT , version INT , date_from DATETIME , date_to DATETIME , customernr INT , Name VARCHAR(26) , firstname VARCHAR(14) , lang VARCHAR(1) , sex VARCHAR(8) , street VARCHAR(16) , housnr VARCHAR(4) , bus VARCHAR(4) , zipcode VARCHAR(10) , location VARCHAR(14) , country VARCHAR(21) , date_of_birth DATETIME ) ;

entry.name: Copy data to [d_customer]
entry.description: This job entry executes the transformation to copy data from: [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_customer] to: [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_customer]
entry.transname: copy [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_customer] to [MySQL Test @ Localhost]

entry.name: Create table [d_customer_test]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_customer_test]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_customer_test ( CUSTOMERNR INT , LASTNAME VARCHAR(22) , FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(12) , LANGUAGE VARCHAR(1) , SEX VARCHAR(8) , STREET VARCHAR(16) , NR VARCHAR(3) , BUS VARCHAR(4) , ZIPCODE VARCHAR(10) , LOCATION VARCHAR(14) , COUNTRY VARCHAR(6) , DATE_OF_BIRTH DATETIME ) ;

entry.name: Copy data to [d_customer_test]
entry.description: This job entry executes the transformation to copy data from: [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_customer_test] to: [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_customer_test]
entry.transname: copy [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_customer_test] to [MySQL Test @ Localhost]

entry.name: Create table [d_date]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_date]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_date ( DATE_TK BIGINT , DATE_NUMBER VARCHAR(8) , DATE_FIELD DATETIME , YEAR VARCHAR(4) , YEAR_SHORT VARCHAR(2) , QUARTER INT , QUARTER_LONG VARCHAR(10) , YEAR_QUARTER VARCHAR(10) , MONTH INT , MONTH_LONG VARCHAR(2) , MONTH_LONG_DESC VARCHAR(20) , MONTH_DESC_SHORT VARCHAR(3) , YEAR_MONTH_ VARCHAR(255) , WEEK INT , WEEK_LONG VARCHAR(2) , YEAR_WEEK VARCHAR(10) , DAY INT , DAY_LONG VARCHAR(2) , DAY_DESC VARCHAR(20) , YEAR_MONTH_DAY VARCHAR(10) , DAY_MONTH_YEAR VARCHAR(10) , MARKER VARCHAR(1) , WEEKDAY INT , SCHOOL VARCHAR(1) , HOLIDAY VARCHAR(1) ) ;

entry.name: Copy data to [d_date]
entry.description: This job entry executes the transformation to copy data from: [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_date] to: [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_date]
entry.transname: copy [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_date] to [MySQL Test @ Localhost]

entry.name: Create table [d_date_test]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_date_test]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_date_test ( date_tk INT , year FLOAT , month FLOAT , day FLOAT , date_field DATETIME , month_desc VARCHAR(15) , month_short_desc VARCHAR(3) , quarter INT , fiscal_month INT , fiscal_quarter INT , ymd VARCHAR(10) , dmy VARCHAR(10) , ym VARCHAR(7) , month_long_desc VARCHAR(15) , week_of_year INT , day_of_week INT , day_of_week_short_desc VARCHAR(3) , day_of_week_desc VARCHAR(15) ) ;

entry.name: Copy data to [d_date_test]
entry.description: This job entry executes the transformation to copy data from: [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_date_test] to: [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_date_test]
entry.transname: copy [MySQL Test @ bolletje].[d_date_test] to [MySQL Test @ Localhost]

entry.name: Create table [d_equipment]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_equipment]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_equipment ( EQUIPMENT_TK INT , ID_REF_EQ BIGINT , VERSION INT , DATE_FROM DATETIME , DATE_TO DATETIME , ID_REF_ROAD BIGINT , WAY_DIRECTION VARCHAR(1) , LOCREF FLOAT , VALID_LOCATION VARCHAR(1) , VALID_LANE VARCHAR(1) , CLASS_NAME VARCHAR(30) , CLASS_DESC TEXT , MAINTENANCE_NAME VARCHAR(30) , MAINTENANCE_DESC TEXT , SUPPLIER_NAME VARCHAR(30) , SUPPLIER_DESC TEXT , NAME VARCHAR(30) , DESCRIPTION TEXT , LENGTH FLOAT , MODEL VARCHAR(50) , SERIAL_NUMBER VARCHAR(30) , IMELDA_NUMBER TEXT , YEAR_IN_SERVICE INT , FLAG_OPER_BUSY VARCHAR(1) , DT_INSERT DATETIME , DT_LAST_UPD DATETIME , UID_INSERT VARCHAR(30) , UID_LAST_UPD VARCHAR(30) , LOC_POST_LANE BIGINT , CONVERSION_ID VARCHAR(20) ) ;

entry.name: Create table [d_klant]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_klant]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_klant ( KLANT_TK BIGINT , VERSION INT , date_from DATETIME , date_to DATETIME , KLANTNR INT , NAAM VARCHAR(26) , VOORNAAM VARCHAR(14) , TAAL VARCHAR(1) , GESLACHT VARCHAR(8) , STRAAT VARCHAR(16) , HUISNR VARCHAR(4) , BUSNR VARCHAR(4) , POST VARCHAR(10) , WPL VARCHAR(14) , LAND VARCHAR(21) , GEBDAT INT ) ;

entry.name: Create table [d_leverancier]
entry.description: This executes the SQL to create table [MySQL Test @ Localhost].[d_leverancier]
entry.sql: CREATE TABLE d_leverancier ( leverancier_tk INT , version INT , datum_van DATETIME , datum_tot DATETIME , F_SUPNR VARCHAR(6) , F_SUPNM VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPNM2 VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPSTR VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPDOM VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPDOM2 VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPTEL VARCHAR(15) , F_SUPTEL2 VARCHAR(15) , F_SUPFAX VARCHAR(15) , F_SUPGSM VARCHAR(15) , F_INTERNET VARCHAR(70) , F_EMAIL VARCHAR(35) , F_FAXCOD VARCHAR(6) , F_SUPCONT VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPVATNR VARCHAR(20) , F_SUPBNKNM VARCHAR(20) , F_SUPBNKAC VARCHAR(25) , F_SUPMCRED BIGINT , F_SUPDCRED INT , F_TOTET BIGINT , F_TOTDB BIGINT , F_TOTCR BIGINT , F_DISTRICT VARCHAR(5) , F_BRANCH VARCHAR(5) , F_RTITLE VARCHAR(20) , F_BLETTER VARCHAR(40) , F_MAILCOD VARCHAR(5) , F_COUNTRY VARCHAR(2) , F_DCOUNTRY VARCHAR(2) , F_MOUNCOD2 VARCHAR(3) , F_LANGUAGE VARCHAR(3) , F_ACCNR VARCHAR(6) , F_DUECOD VARCHAR(2) , F_TAXCOD VARCHAR(2) , F_FACNM VARCHAR(30) , F_FACSTR VARCHAR(30) , F_FACDOMIC VARCHAR(30) , F_FACBNKAC VARCHAR(25) , F_SUPREFNR VARCHAR(10) , F_EMPNR VARCHAR(6) , F_FEATURE VARCHAR(20) , F_LISTCOD VARCHAR(20) , F_DOCTCOD VARCHAR(1) , F_FIDIPCT BIGINT , F_TNDEDPCT BIGINT , F_ICOUNTRY VARCHAR(2) , F_OCOUNTRY VARCHAR(2) , F_ITRANSPO VARCHAR(2) , F_IPLACELU VARCHAR(2) , F_ITRANSAC VARCHAR(2) , F_IGOODS VARCHAR(10) , F_INETMASS BIGINT , F_IQUANT BIGINT , F_IREGION VARCHAR(1) , F_INCOTERM VARCHAR(3) , F_FEACOD1 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD2 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD3 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD4 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD5 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD6 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD7 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD8 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD9 VARCHAR(30) , F_FEACOD10 VARCHAR(30) , F_SUPODOW VARCHAR(5) , F_SUPDDOW VARCHAR(5) , F_AFDAT DATETIME , F_LCDAT DATETIME , F_PCLINK VARCHAR(1) , F_CTSREVIS BIGINT ) ;

entry.name: Create table [d_place]
